message_1: Identify the element and its corresponding isotopes in the following isotope notation: ¹⁶₈O, ¹⁷₀O, and ¹⁸O.
message_2:
The element in the given isotope notations is Oxygen (O). The isotopes are represented by the numbers before the element symbol. In this case, the isotopes are:

1. Oxygen-16 (¹⁶O) - This isotope has 8 protons and 8 neutrons.
2. Oxygen-17 (¹⁷O) - This isotope has 8 protons and 9 neutrons.
3. Oxygen-18 (¹⁸O) - This isotope has 8 protons and 10 neutrons.
